Its the Marvel version of Batgod. You know how they always seem to need a way to make Batman able to beat fucking everybody? Because Batman is so kewl, and brooding and shit?

Well its the exact same thing here. That shit is written by people who absolutely wank to Frank Castle because he -dork- dark, so he's gotta be cooler and more dangerous than every other fucking character in the universe.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55483f8a6368725d6a930c00#post_55483f8a6368725d6a930c00
I do like it when heroes punch outside their weight class, and I'm totally cool with Bats taking down god tier threats, I just A.) want him to actually be smart about it, and B.) not go it alone.

Like I could see him teaming up with Superman to take on Darkseid, and I'd totally buy Bruce being the brains behind the operation, coming up with strategy and stuff or playing on Darkseid's vanity, but he should not be the one beating him up.

topics.body:
I just thought of something; why don't in cities where there's a lot of homeless architects plan ahead knowing that homeless will congregate in areas with shelter so as to keep them to certain areas and pass it off as being artsy.

Like have a drain overpass indentations towards the back of the building that on the one hand gives shelter from the rain if they're underneath it and have a little cubby hole, but on the other hand if they start trying to expand into the street and blocking traffic they'll get rained on cause the road has a grate over it.  They'll obviously piss, poop and throw garbage into the rain drain but better it wind up in the sewers than it pilling up behind the building.
